title: Help!
content:
Hello everyone, I have just joined the site and I really am not sure whether I am posting this in the right section...  
I am desperate to find out how to get hold of this font, from a cd cover...I have been looking for the right font for ages in order to create a tattoo, saw this one on a poster yesterday and knew I have found it!  
Please can anyone be as specific as possible regarding this font and where to find a quality printable version?

Many many thanks, comrades!

IGNACIO

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120720134917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/5606671x_4914.jpg)
author: ignatius73

comments.content: (You need to post this in the Type ID Board section)
